name: Pong like
description:
In Pong like, the player will use the mouse to manipulate the "circle" on the right side of the interface to move the bricks.
  
This is not a game that is intended to give the player fun and enjoyment. Instead, it was created for the purpose of exploring the language of my game. The game is a language. It does not consist of restrictions on types and gameplay. In a set of languages, the various grammars are embodied. The grammar can be puzzle,act, fps, etc. The so-called game type is actually applied as a grammar to the game. Pong like A trial game that attempts to define grammar. It does not emphasize any experience flow to the player. It is a grammar.)
